verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) <S%H2142>Remember,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> on David's behalf, <S%H3605>All<s%> his <S%H6031>affliction;<s%>
<S%H834>How<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And <S%H5087>vowed<s%> to the <S%H46>Mighty<s%> <S%H46>One<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%>
<S%H518>"Surely<s%> I will not <S%H935>enter<s%> my <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H518>Nor<s%> <S%H5927>lie<s%> on my <S%H6210>bed<s%><S%H3326>;<s%>
I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H8142>sleep<s%> to my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> Or <S%H8572>slumber<s%> to my <S%H6079>eyelids;<s%>
<S%H5704>Until<s%> I <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> A <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H4908>place<s%> for the <S%H46>Mighty<s%> <S%H46>One<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> "
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> we <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it in <S%H672>Ephrathah;<s%> We <S%H4672>found<s%> it in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H9194>Jaar.<s%>
Let us <S%H935>go<s%> into His <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H4908>place;<s%> Let us <S%H7812>worship<s%> at His <S%H1916>footstool.<s%> <S%H7272><s%>
<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to Thy <S%H4496>resting<s%> <S%H4496>place;<s%> Thou and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of Thy <S%H5797>strength.<s%>
Let Thy <S%H3548>priests<s%> be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H6664>righteousness;<s%> And let Thy <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>ones<s%> <S%H7442>sing<s%> for <S%H7442>joy.<s%>
For the <S%H5668>sake<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> Do not <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of Thine <S%H4899>anointed.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> A <S%H571>truth<s%> from which He will not <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>back;<s%> "Of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H990>body<s%> I will <S%H7896>set<s%> upon your <S%H3678>throne.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> will <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> And My <S%H9381>testimony<s%> <S%H2097>which<s%> I will <S%H3925>teach<s%> them, Their <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon your <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H5703>forever.<s%>"
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> He has <S%H183>desired<s%> it for His <S%H4186>habitation.<s%>
<S%H384>"This<s%> is My <S%H4496>resting<s%> <S%H4496>place<s%> <S%H5703>forever;<s%> <S%H6311>Here<s%> I will <S%H3427>dwell,<s%> for I have <S%H183>desired<s%> it.
"I will <S%H1288>abundantly<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> her <S%H9479>provision;<s%> I will <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> her <S%H34>needy<s%> with <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
"Her <S%H3548>priests<s%> also I will <S%H3847>clothe<s%> with <S%H3468>salvation;<s%> And her <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>ones<s%> will <S%H7442>sing<s%> <S%H7442>aloud<s%> for <S%H7442>joy.<s%>

<S%H8033>"There<s%> I will cause the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H6779>spring<s%> <S%H6779>forth;<s%> I have <S%H6186>prepared<s%> a <S%H5216>lamp<s%> for Mine <S%H4899>anointed.<s%>
"His <S%H340>enemies<s%> I will <S%H3847>clothe<s%> with <S%H1322>shame;<s%> But upon himself his <S%H5145>crown<s%> shall <S%H6692>shine.<s%>"
